amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore $46 million in funding to the Vehicle Technologies program by eliminating an increase in funding for the fossil fuel industry.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase allocations for energy and efficiency and renewable energy by $46,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 543).
